name: noSkype
tagline: Basic plugin to stop skype hijacking your phone numbers!
body:
noSkype jQuery Plugin
=======

Basic plugin to stop skype rebuilding your links and adding awful styling!

Currently the plugin only works with phone numbers that contain spaces/hyphens/dashes. Feel free to fork and expand!


Usage
=======
```javascript
$(function(){
    $('.noSkypeClass').noSkype();
});
```

This will prevent skype hijacking your links

Demo
======
demo.html is included with a demonstration
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
